title: 报错求解！
author: Z战陈
txt_content:
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLConnection.java:1300)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.connect(AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.java:177)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(HttpURLConnection.java:932)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 java.net.UnknownHostException: api.curseforge.com
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDeleg ... on.getNewHttpClient(AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.java:191)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.New(HttpsClient.java:371)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.<init>(HttpsClient.java:275)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:527)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:432)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(NetworkClient.java:175)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.connect(SSLSocketImpl.java:618)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:392)
27.09 20:00:05 [Server] 严重 at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java:178)27.09 20:00:04 [Server] 信息 mcstats.org
好像是forgeAPI的问题·

replies.txt_content: 无视掉  插件没办法获取更新

replies.author: village
replies.txt_content: 是不是有2个人在服务器里就会出现的？

replies.author: Z战陈
replies.txt_content:
village 发表于 2014-9-27 20:55
是不是有2个人在服务器里就会出现的？
一开服就出现

replies.author: village
replies.txt_content:
Z战陈 发表于 2014-9-27 20:57
一开服就出现
那我就不清楚；了。应该对服务器没啥影响吧。报错；里面似乎没有提到哪款插件出问题
